headline: PPG names two associate fellows, recognizing technical achievements aligned to growth
summary: PITTSBURGH, April 16, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that it has promoted scientists David Fenn and Renhe Lin to PPG associate fellow. A prestigious designation with the scientific community, the associate fellow title recognizes PPG science and technology employees who consistently deliver excellence in innovation and acknowledges the future value potential they can deliver.
